how_to_earn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
how_to_earn_golden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack randomly split among all enemies.
name: C'Thun
flavor_text: C'Thun's least favorite Hearthstone card: Eye for an Eye.
how_to_earn: Unlocked when opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Crafting unlocked after opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.

text: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.
name: DOOM!
flavor_text: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand.
name: Deathwing
flavor_text: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

text: Deathrattle: Put all Dragons from your hand into the battlefield.
name: Deathwing, Dragonlord
flavor_text: To his credit, Deathwing really took to heart the feedback he was receiving that he needed to be "more of a team player".

name: Faceless Behemoth
flavor_text: Rejected names: Forty-Foot Faceless, Big ol' No-face, Huge Creature Sans Face, Teddy.

text: Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.
name: Frost Giant
flavor_text: Don't ask him about the beard.  JUST DON'T.

text: Choose One - Gain 10 Armor; or Refresh your Mana Crystals.
name: Kun the Forgotten King
flavor_text: Aya siphons a bit of Kun's soul to animate each golem in her Jade army. To his credit, he's being a great sport about it.

text: Take control of an enemy minion.
name: Mind Control
flavor_text: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."
how_to_earn: Unlocked at Level 10.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked at Level 49.

text: Battlecry: Summon your Deathrattle minions that died this game.
name: N'Zoth, the Corruptor
flavor_text: Has not been able to get "Under the Sea" out of his head for like FIVE THOUSAND YEARS.

text: Deal 10 damage.
name: Pyroblast
flavor_text: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
name: Sea Giant
flavor_text: See?  Giant.

text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards. Put any minions you drew directly into the battlefield.
name: Varian Wrynn
flavor_text: Leader of the Alliance!  Father of Anduin!  Also he likes to play Arena, and he averages 12 wins.

text: At the end of your turn, put a minion from your deck into the battlefield.
name: Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound
flavor_text: When he's working out, he binds all that rage back into a ponytail.

text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell for each spell you've cast this game (targets chosen randomly).
name: Yogg-Saron, Hope's End
flavor_text: I spell your doom... Y-O-U-R D-O-O-M!

text:
Costs (1) less for each spell
you've cast this game.
name: Arcane Giant
flavor_text: Claims to be drawn to Karazhan because of the ley lines. Actually, just loves Moroes’ cooking.
how_to_earn: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
how_to_earn_golden: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

text: Costs (1) less for each card in your opponent's hand.
name: Clockwork Giant
flavor_text: He and Mountain Giant don't get along.

text: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
name: Mountain Giant
flavor_text: His mother said that he was just big boned.

text: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.
name: Molten Giant
flavor_text: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.
